## Header 1

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(targets)
tar_config_set(store = here::here("_targets"))
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- tar_read(lipidomics)
```

```{r}
# Code chunk
readr::read_csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
usethis::use_git_ignore("data-raw/nmr-omics/")
```

## Creating table

```{r}
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
create_table_descriptive_stats(lipidomics) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```

## Results: basic stats table

```{r}
tar_read(table_descriptive_stats) |>
  knitr::kable(
    caption = "The mean and standard deviation of metabolites in the lipidomics dataset."
  )
```

## Plot of distributions

```{r}
ggplot(
  lipidomics,
  aes(x = as.numeric(value))
) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free") +
  theme_minimal()
```
